    • Constructor Detail

      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle​(String type,
               char id,
               Hex hex,
               Direction facing,
               MovementFactory movementFactory,
               RealComponent turret,
               RealComponent front,
               RealComponent rear,
               RealComponent rightSide,
               RealComponent leftSide)
        Construct a new vehicle.
        Parameters:
        id - identification of unit, should be unique to each unit
        type - type of unit
        hex - starting hex coordinate
        facing - initial facing direction
        movementFactory - factory to use to construct movement strategies
        turret - turret component
        front - front component
        rear - rear component
        rightSide - right side component
        leftSide - left side component

        public boolean isDestroyed()
